mapper.update: UPDATE Stocktaking SET stocktaking_Id = #{stockTakingId}, stock_id = #{stockId}, planned_date = #{plannedDate}, inspector = #{inspector}, status = #{status}, status_detail = #{statusDetail} WHERE stocktaking_id = #{stockTakingId};
mapper.select: SELECT s.id as stockId, p.id as productId, p.name as productName, c.sub_category as productSubCategory, s.quantity as computerizedStock, st.status as status, st.status_detail as statusDetail FROM Stocktaking st Join Stock s on s.id = st.stock_id JOIN Product p on s.product_id = p.id JOIN Category c on p.category_id = c.id where stocktaking_id = #{stockTakingId};
SELECT * FROM Stocktaking st Join Stock s on s.id where stocktaking_id LIKE CONCAT('%', #{stockTakingId}, '%');
